reason: Question is specific about 성폭력범죄 벌금형 결격사유. Answer correctly states 100만원 이상 벌금형, 3년 제한, and lists the three crime categories from 제33조 6의3. Matches page 53 source.
Question is specific about 미성년자 성범죄 임용제한 기간. Answer correctly states 20년 and lists all 5 categories (가~마) from 제33조 6의4. Properly reformulated. Matches page 53 source.
Bad question: 제69조 is about 당연퇴직 (automatic dismissal), not something you '신청' (apply for). Also raw dump: answer copies the entire source text of 제69조 and 제33조 verbatim without reformulation.
Bad question: asks about '과정' (process) but 당연퇴직 under 제69조 occurs automatically with no process. Also raw dump of source text and duplicate of q_1_0783 with nearly identical answer.
Bad question: asks about '일수' (number of days) of 제69조 which is nonsensical - 당연퇴직 has no day-count concept. Raw dump of source text. Duplicate answer of q_1_0783 and q_1_0784.
Bad question: asks about '기간과 횟수' (period and frequency) - 당연퇴직 has no 'frequency' concept. Raw dump of source text. Duplicate answer of q_1_0783/0784/0785.
Bad question: '제한사항' is too vague for 제69조. Raw dump of entire source text without reformulation. Duplicate answer of q_1_0783/0784/0785/0786.
Raw dump: answer copies section headings and source text verbatim including structural markers. Also a duplicate - same topic and largely same answer as q_1_0783-0787 series about 국가공무원법 제69조.
Duplicate of q_1_0796 (same topic: 당연퇴직 법령 규정). Raw dump of source text with structural headings copied verbatim. Answer is truncated (only lists 제33조 items 1-2).

Bad question: asks about 임용권자's role in 제69조, but 당연퇴직 is automatic and page 53 doesn't discuss 임용권자's role. Answer doesn't address the question at all - just another raw dump of 제69조/제33조 text. Duplicate answer.
